concept.title: Fairtrade certification
concept.abstract: Content Etc's Ultraheat family gives lovers of coffee and tea the fairest of experience.Fairtrade certification shows that fairness runs right through a company's daily operations. If a company meets the social, economic and environmental standards set out by Fairtrade International, they can trade under Fairtrade conditions and display the Fairtrade Mark on their products. This is tightly governed.

conbody.p: By certifying the whole supply chain – from farming and production of raw materials, all the way to the packaged product – the Fairtrade International ensures that the integrity of Fairtrade, and your integrity as a Fairtrader is never compromised.
